title: Medford-Tufts/2 bed w/ pkg, cat ok, private laundry
posting_body: Clean and basic 2 bedroom apartment available for rent in an owner-occupied two-family.
Great location in Medford's Hillside neighborhood just a short distance to Tufts University.
First floor unit with kitchen, dining room, living room, 2 bedrooms and 1 bathroom.
Kitchen has gas cooking, dishwasher, and stainless-steel appliances.
Bathroom features a ceramic tile shower and lovely vanity.
Private laundry in the basement as well as private back deck.
Easy off-street parking with your own dedicated driveway for 1 car.
Fantastic location with easy access to great restaurants such as Danish Pastry House, Tamper, Goldilox, and the upcoming GLX station at College Ave.
First, security and broker fee due upon application.
Tenants pay gas, electric and cable/internet in addition to rent.
Contact Jennifer Keenan, Keller Williams Realty Boston-Northwest - (781) 704-3193 to arrange a showing.
